title: Miguel Amezcua Alejo
text: Miguel Amezcua Alejo (born 18 May 1968) is a Mexican politician affiliated with the <a href="Institutional%20Revolutionary%20Party">Institutional Revolutionary Party</a>. As of 2014 he served as Deputy of the <a href="LIX%20Legislature%20of%20the%20Mexican%20Congress">LIX Legislature of the Mexican Congress</a> representing <a href="Michoac%C3%A1n">Michoacán</a>.
